  • Method Details

    • uploadMaterial

      @PostMapping(value="/upload", consumes="multipart/form-data") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MaterialResponseDto> uploadMaterial(@ModelAttribute MaterialDto materialDto)
      Endpoint to upload study material. Expects 'multipart/form-data' because it includes a file. * URL: POST http://localhost:8080/api/materials/upload Authorization: Bearer

    • getAllApprovedMaterials

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MaterialResponseDto>> getAllApprovedMaterials()
      Endpoint to get all APPROVED materials for students. * URL: GET http://localhost:8080/api/materials

    • getPendingMaterials

      @GetMapping("/pending") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MaterialResponseDto>> getPendingMaterials()
      Endpoint for ADMIN to view all pending materials. URL: GET http://localhost:8080/api/materials/pending

    • approveMaterial

      @PutMapping("/{id}/approve") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> approveMaterial(@PathVariable Long id)
      Endpoint for ADMIN to approve a material. URL: PUT http://localhost:8080/api/materials/{id}/approve

    • deleteMaterial

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteMaterial(@PathVariable Long id)
      Endpoint for ADMIN to delete a material (DB + Cloudinary). URL: DELETE http://localhost:8080/api/materials/{id}

    • searchMaterials

      @GetMapping("/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MaterialResponseDto>> searchMaterials(@RequestParam(required=false) String subject, @RequestParam(required=false) String semester, @RequestParam(required=false) String type, @RequestParam(required=false) String query)
      Endpoint to Search and Filter materials. URL: GET http://localhost:8080/api/materials/search?subject=Javainvalid input: '&semester'=Semester 1 All parameters are optional.

    • downloadMaterial

      @GetMapping("/{id}/download") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> downloadMaterial(@PathVariable Long id)
      Endpoint to Download file (Increments count + Redirects to Cloudinary). URL: GET http://localhost:8080/api/materials/{id}/download

    • addReview

      @PostMapping("/{id}/reviews") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReviewDto> addReview(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody ReviewDto reviewDto)

    • updateMaterial

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MaterialResponseDto> updateMaterial(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody MaterialUpdateDto updateDto)
      Endpoint to Update Material Metadata (No File Change). Accessible by Owner and ADMIN. URL: PUT http://localhost:8080/api/materials/{id}
